text: The Grimsby & Immingham Electric Railway was an electric tramway network linking the township of Grimsby and the then village of Immingham in Lincolnshire. It is probably best described by the American term "Inter-Urban" as it links the places in its title by a reserved way rather than through the streets. Category:Tram transport in the United Kingdom Category:1923 establishments in England Category:1961 disestablishments Category:1960s disestablishments in England Category:Buildings and structures in Lincolnshire
title: Grimsby and Immingham Electric Railway
